bonsoir a tous: hello i have intall unbunto since 5 minutes and it's the first time that i use linux
how can i install the support to read mp3 please ?
i search a consol to type a command but i don't find it
No problem. Install 'nautilus-open-terminal' - then you have a 'terminal' option in the right-click menu everywhere.
Probably just get gstreamer0.8-plugins and gstreamer0.8-plugins-multiverse.
Then search for the package names, right click them... then click 'Apply'.
: ok i have install gstreamer after ?
if you make sure gstreamer0.8-plugins and gstreamer0.8-plugins-multiverse are installed, you'll be fine.
